definition: meet by chance/have a chance encounter
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: Surprise, consciousness, and pleasure appeared in each of the three on this unexpected meeting;
sentences.chinese: 这次不期而遇使得三人个个又惊又喜，又觉尴尬。

sentences.english: His hand and shoulder were twitching from the unlooked-for contact.
sentences.chinese: 由于这不期而遇的相逢，他的手和肩部在抽搐。

sentences.english: Iguess I don't have to call you , now that I ran into you .
sentences.chinese: 既然我们不期而遇了，我想就没必要给你打电话了。

sentences.english: The first-time snake buyer is most likely to encounter these snakes.
sentences.chinese: 玩蛇新手最有可能与这些蛇不期而遇。

sentences.english: If you can meet with triumph and disaster and treat those too imposters just the same.
sentences.chinese: 下附口你与成功和失败不期而遇，把二者皆视为骗子。

sentences.english: Oneafternoon while we were there at that lake a thunderstorm came up.
sentences.chinese: 有天下午，我们在湖边与一场雷雨不期而遇。
人潮拥挤再也不会不期而遇。

sentences.english: Here, he was named one of the girls Jeana chance.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，他同一位名叫让娜的姑娘不期而遇。

sentences.english: This unexpectedly bad performance has placed the president in an uncomfortable spot.
sentences.chinese: 不期而遇的糟糕情况让奥巴马总统寝食不安。

sentences.english: She ran against an old schoolmate in the park last week.
sentences.chinese: 她上星期在公园中和一个老同学不期而遇。

sentences.english: Lonely, when reading, just like a peek into the face of a dead person.
sentences.chinese: 落寞时读书，便如面对一位不期而遇的故人。

sentences.english: We ran into each other on the street.

definition: to meet by chance/to run into sb/chance encounter
to meet again after a long period of separation
to see each other/to meet in person
to get to know each other/acquaintance
fate or chance that brings people together/predestined affinity or relationship/(Budd.) destiny
to arrive as planned/right on schedule
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
